Support Tertulia

Ticket sales alone make up the majority of Tertulia's annual revenue, but we still need your help to balance our budget. And we're a 501(c)(3) non-profit, so your gift is tax-deductible.

Become a Member

Take advantage of special events, open rehearsals, restaurant discounts and more by becoming a member. Specific benefits include:

  • Acknowledgement in every program for our 2015-2016 season
  • A tax-deductible donation to Tertulia, Inc. a 501(c)(3)
  • Special invitations to private events with Tertulia's Board of Directors, Artistic Directors, and Artists
  • Season-long 10% discount at Harding's
  • Priority access to pre-sale tickets
  • Friends and family discounts to select Tertulias
  • Exclusive invitations to open rehearsals

Season Sponsorship

Tertulia is a fast-growing new chamber music series that is aimed at the city's younger generation of concert-goers. If you or your company is interested in sponsorship, please contact Julia Villagra.

About Tertulia

Tertulia is a chamber music series that is designed to attract new and experienced audiences alike, or really, anyone who loves incredible food and music. Tertulia presents world-class chamber music concerts in restaurants around the city, with three performances separated by extended intermissions. The format and program is designed to enhance the social and culinary experience, but at all Tertulias, the music is paramount.
